c74object.name: tap.jit.proximity
c74object.description: The tap.jit.proximity object looks at a matrix containing pairs of coordinates and returns the pair that is nearest to the input coords. It can be used to create custom interfaces.

method.name: coords
method.description: Perform a look up in the matrix and return the nearest pair of coordinates in the matrix.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of the matrix containing the coordinate sets to reference.
